actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 3482) entitled "A bill for the relief of Monroe Garment Company, Incorporated" to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.

summary.text: Refers S. 3482, entitled "A bill for the relief of Monroe Garment Company, Incorporated," to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.

titles.title: A resolution to refer the bill (S. 3482) entitled "A bill for the relief of Monroe Garment Company, Incorporated" to the Chief Commissioner of the United States Court of Claims for a report thereon.
